description: Exploring the humorous dynamics of a couple debating gym membership.
title: Workout Woes
n_1: Emma and Jack, sitting on a park bench, discussing gym memberships.
c1_1: I think we should join the gym together, it'll be fun!
c2_1: I'm not so sure, Emma. I've heard some relationships don't survive the gym!
n_2: Emma looks at Jack with a mix of amusement and disbelief.
c1_2: Are you serious? That's just an excuse!
c2_2: No, really! They say some relationships don't work out there.
n_3: Jack chuckles at his own joke, while Emma rolls her eyes.
n_4: Both laugh together, enjoying the sunny day in the park.
c1_4: Okay, let's give it a try. But no more gym puns!
c2_4: Deal! But only if you promise not to out-lift me.
